entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C

Observed at: Port aux Basques 6:30 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
